DOC.brief_title: First In Human Study Of Increasing Oral Doses Of PF-04634817
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ( nonchild bear potential ) subject 18 55 year age . Body mass index 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 total body weight > 50kg . Evidence history clinically significant disease . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day study start Use prescription nonprescription medicine within 7 day study start
